text: Going to see a doctor today   Hey guys This is my first post here  I have come to realise that my marriage is falling apart last week  I have asked r relationship advice a short while ago asking for advice on how to deal with the Mother in Law   link here https www reddit com r relationship advice comments bo w u i feel like i am married to the mil as well utm source share amp utm medium web x amp x B Following the advice I received I tried on multiple occasions to talk to the wife but she won t have any of it and won t talk about it  She said that I m the one with the problem and that I need to get over myself and accept her being a part of our life amp x B The past two three weeks I have been feeling empty  Nothing  I just plough on  on auto pilot  When my wife asks me why I m grumpy  I tell her that she knows why  She just rolls her eyes amp x B Thing is we have a kid  There is no situation in which I end up happy  If I leave my wife  I lose everything and don t get to see my kid much amp x B I drive   minutes to work and   minutes back every day  I enjoy the drive  IT helps me relax and listen to my music  Today  however   l appel du vide  called to me  I started thinking about how life would be simpler for everyone if I just slipped  The mortgage would be paid off  My wife would get a hefty payoff  The mother in law will be happy to continue  I am at work so I didn t do anything stupid amp x B The only thing that keeps me happy right now is my kid  One year old  Light in the darkness that is my life amp x B I called my General Practice surgery and I have an appointment at   today  They will probably feed me pills and tell me things will get better  We will see amp x B Sorry for the long drawn out post  Just trying to express how I feel  I guess I just feel like sharing
